nodes.text: Adam Deacon’s mental health issues and conflict with Noel Clarke is now looking very very different.
@jasebyjason Sorry to rain on the parade but surely this whole story is a bit ridiculous?
@jasebyjason I said exactly the same

@sizzles24 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Don't patronize me. Of course I know allegations must be proven in law. But if he IS guilty, good for them for outing him now so safeguards can be put in place to protect other women now. Innocent until proven guilty under law, but very likely guilty given the number of accusers

@BritishRedcoatX @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Good then you know the basics, and no it's not good that an outing happens before a court case otherwise it won't be a fair trial, worse they may not even take it to court. Thats what they are, "accusers" at this moment in time.

@BritishRedcoatX @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Bravery, let's stick to the facts? Who are these 27 anonymous women and have these allegations been proven before publically destroying this guy?  If you know anything about police or the law there needs to evidence and grounds for them not to ignore it.
@sizzles24 @BritishRedcoatX @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke If you'd read the article you would know that 10 of the 20 women that came out initially were not anonymous.
@sizzles24 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke I guess you don't have a lot of personal experience in reporting things to the UK police if you have to ask that question.
@BritishRedcoatX @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke I do have experience and if the evidence is there they don't have good reason to ignore it really.

@sizzles24 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke If they HAVE been abused & Police/Bafta took no action they are very brave to out him to safeguard others. Either way, the law will take its course. Allegations by 27 women at the last count, together with allegations now being made by his male co-stars too can't be ignored.
@BritishRedcoatX @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Yes I've seen this. Lots of hearsay. Not the way to go about it.
@BritishRedcoatX @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Why would they ignore it?

@sizzles24 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke From the link: https://t.co/Q8LHSl5pwQ "Bafta’s decision to venerate Clarke moved numerous women to break their silence. They allege Clarke is a serial abuser of women, using his power in the industry to prey on and harass female colleagues"
@sizzles24 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke https://t.co/2KaCJx0SOh

@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Should be a police matter first. I find it odd that the victims went to the guardian but not the police or came forward to the baftas. No one would care about this if noel wasn't at the top of his game. Innocent til proven guilty not by public trial simple.
@sizzles24 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke It's not though is it, anyone with common sense can see that

@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Your common sense should get you to ask yourself whether 20 women have actually  come forward or if the guardian went contacting noels colleagues to sensationalise a story whilst ruing someone's life. If I went digging in your past I'd prob easily enuf people who didn't like you.
@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke The number is irrelevant, this isn't public trial - people are innocent until proven guilty by law of the land. This press circus is a shit show.
@jasebyjason @NoelClarke is really trying to tell us all 20 women have got it wrong, smh
@jasebyjason But why now, if noel wasn't winning a badya non one would care. Adam you have had a Petty fued w noel, you arnt going up cos someone is else is going down. Crab pot mentality.

@JamesFr89757087 @pisspoorjudgem1 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Indeed, and all that’s happened is that his professional collaborators have seen and believed the testimony of 20 women and decided that they no longer wish to be associated with him. The public are not obliged to hold him to a criminal standard.

@CarolineTired @JamesFr89757087 @pisspoorjudgem1 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke I think you comment about the public is the crux of the issue. We are not holding ourselves out as juries but we all have a view and are entitled to have a view and if we get it wrong we’ll say sorry got it wrong.

@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke OK let's agree to differ.  I know women personally who have suffered sexual abuse/harassment and the perpetrators got away with it.  Just because a case is 'weak' doesn't mean it didn't happen.

@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke This from the CPS website:  The CPS has to prove the absence of consent in rape cases, and needs to consider if the complainant did not have the freedom and/or capacity to consent.

@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke The CPS have to prove 'absence of consent' which is very difficult, particularly as a huge percentage of rape occurs in a domestic situation.

@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke In an ideal world, yes.  Fact is (National Office of Statistics) only 6% of sexual crimes are reported to the Police for various reasons; embarrassment, fear of not being believed, fear of repercussions...
@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Perhaps the victims didn't report Clarke to the Police as they thought they wouldn't be taken seriously?
@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke I hate the "no smoke without fire" brigade and innocent  lives have been ruined, but have you read the article? 20 women!

@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke He's not going to admit to them is he though?  Justice will be served.  He could not be 'my father.. my son..' as these wonderful men in my life are incredibly decent and respectful towards women.  Unlike the sexual predator Clarke.
@Jazz54203625 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke And it's not as if he was hiding his abhorrent attitudes.\n\nhttps://t.co/11w820xdqG
@jasebyjason 💯
@ShadowRego @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason I'm not the one with the issue. How do you even type all that out and decide you don't need full stops?
@Ktfleming6 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason I dont need instructions to read

@Ktfleming6 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Your issue must be tough to live with someone who needs . , ! ? On social media with the limit must have a real hard time if you need instructions on how to read
@ShadowRego @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Bit of an improvement. Could do better.

@Ktfleming6 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Thats nice , good to know maybe if something like lack of punctuation on something with limit characters gives you a headache and you are smart enough to know to take a second and you need a . To tell you you must have a bad time i feel for you
@ShadowRego @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Dude, please use punctuation. I have a headache reading all that...
@Ktfleming6 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Or if u just wanna pretend its not racism lets say discrimination  point is he was a dick to adam and others beacuse of their races aswell as other things

@Ktfleming6 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Here we go hes not racist coz hes black ok well then hed say shit about adams racist and be a prick to others coz they were white OR darker than him so yeah its race was a reason hed have to be a dick so its still racist
@ShadowRego @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Noel is black... How was it racist
@jasebyjason He was absolutely my first thought after reading the article.
@StevieAudio @jasebyjason Same
@DanStrongTea @jasebyjason He basiclly bullied him stopped him gettin jobs was pure racist and basiclly a peice of shit
@a_lewi_ @jasebyjason Yep, because insinuating you will have someone's children killed is ok, as long as you think you have a valid reason 🤡
@Andy_Wi11iamson @jasebyjason Of course that's not ok
@LateefSaka I didn’t form an opinion tbh
@jasebyjason @LateefSaka So what you're both saying is that it's ok to insinuate you will have somebody's children murdered, as long as their father is a bully/sexual abuser? Big men.
@jasebyjason Poor Adam 💔 he deserved so much better

@jasebyjason This is a good time to remember that just because someone is suffering from mental illness, it doesn’t mean they’re not telling the truth. #adamdeacon ‘s story is heartbreaking #MentalHealthAwareness

@BedontB @jasebyjason Adam Deacon threatened Noel Clark's kids, insinuating he could have them shot. Let's not pretend he's all of a sudden some innocent party that was wronged by the evil bully/sexual abuser. He's not.
@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Have they gone to the police

@marajuanaman_ @jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason Thank you so much for your words on this. I abhor the "all men" narrative and it needs to be known that there are good, decent men around us women in society.
@DDRey @jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason Says it all doesn’t it? https://t.co/rbQNnKc6Z7
@jasebyjason Yep!
@AdMelauren @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason A few people apprently
@JamesFr89757087 @pisspoorjudgem1 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke It is literally a case of he said she said x20
@ManesBigToe @JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke https://t.co/jRprfMchVE
@jasebyjason I believed Adam Deacon then, and I believe the 20 women that have come forward now.
@jasebyjason Adam waking up today https://t.co/j9jkvIEGXo
@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Why not? https://t.co/TBE2QxbDek
@JamesFr89757087 @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Mate there are literally 20 women this isn't some wild conspiracy, Noel is a creep end of

@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke All those people were actual physical contact. This is harassment claims against Noel alas wolf whistle, sarcastic sexist comments etc. Basically everything they did in the Carry On movies is unacceptable today and could ruin your career.
@DChappleton @jasebyjason @NoelClarke They secretly filmed naked auditions and shared it with their friends in Carry On films? Have you read the Guardian article?
@JamesFr89757087 @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Sigh there's always one

@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Hmm was it rounded to 20 or was it bang on 20 girls who came forward? \n\nAs portrayed in the Wayans movie 'The Man'. It seems that influential black people always get targeted and brought down somehow. https://t.co/BUOipNy56K

@DChappleton @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Arnie Hammer, Kevin Spacey, Ansel Elghort, Bryan Singer and Harvey Weinstein would all disagree with you in this context. Also Adam Deacon called him out years ago, that just doesn't hold water. \n\nI'm sure it does happen it certain cases, just not this one
@jasebyjason They looked the exact same tbh,people just wanted to igmore it
@jasebyjason @LewisMac01 Why what happened @LewisMac01
@jasebyjason Didn’t he threaten Clarke’s kids with images of them side by side with a gun? Clarke is obviously a wrong’un but his kids are innocent parties.
@iamdjkinging @jasebyjason Bro, read the room
@Benris84 @jasebyjason Deleted I was just sharing and didn’t have time to read the write up ..\nSorry and sending ❤️🦅🦅🦅
@JamesFr89757087 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Everything I said is facts.
@jasebyjason What he do?
@pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Exactly, makes you wonder how many allegations @BAFTA needs before not awarding someone too. 50? 100?
@Fergal_HB @pisspoorjudgem1 @jasebyjason @NoelClarke @BAFTA I hear 25 gets you a free cup of coffee. https://t.co/ZpRjVlMouw
@JamesFr89757087 @pisspoorjudgem1 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke *condemn\n\nNoel, is that you?

@jasebyjason If it was a female making those claims Deacon might have been taken seriously, no doubt more women would have spoken out\nSo sad hearing this news as I liked Clarke. Before reading the article I thought maybe it'd be a few vague incidents as opposed to the bullying & harassment

@jasebyjason It never entered my mind that he'd be this level of low\nFrom the way he conducts himself in interviews & his story overall..shocking\nHave to feel for the victims, takes strength to speak out
@jasebyjason I instantly thought that too!
@jasebyjason The truth will always out
@jasebyjason Adam Deacon is a genuine fella and a much better actor than Noel Clarke who has coasted for twenty years off being a "nice guy".
@jasebyjason ...Not really?

@DanStrongTea @ShadowRego @jasebyjason Yeah, I googled him and he apparently joined up with a mental health charity called 'Mind' which made me happy. I was also relieved that when he went to trial for a mental health crisis, he had a sympathetic jury who were understanding and helped him

@DDRey @jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason Yes the ‘all men’thing is wrong...but I could imagine such I’ll treatment could make a woman feel this way...of course there are bad men and bad women but seems to be a lot of cowardly low life men out there doing this abusing..don’t give up hope there are lots of very good men🙏

@jenn1fer1991 @marajuanaman_ @jasebyjason I have also been fortunate enough to meet some lovely, decent guys; a couple I had relationships with but most are friends I've known for years, some over 30 years. So glad to hear you've found a diamond. May you find all the love, trust and happiness you deserve. X

@jasebyjason to put it mildly...

I have an anxiety disorder, and it would still be pretty difficult to give me  a panic attack so bad I turned blue and needed an ambulance...

that's ...
Shockingly intense bullying.
just, monstrous.
@jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason I can only imagine...any man that does that to a women is pure scum..makes my blood boil...so I can only imagine how you feel....🙏🙏
@jenn1fer1991 @marajuanaman_ @jasebyjason YES. THIS. Solidarity and strength X
@jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason Sorry to hear that,yeah arrogant prick thought he was above getting found out.good on those brave women....he’s finished 🙏
@jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason I also agree,20 women is a lot and I had a gut feeling he was a wrong un....he deystroyed Adam deacon because of his power ...looking like it was all true

@jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason Brilliant,Noel was furious about this film...I thought it was hilarious..although it seems Adam was right and Noel pretty much ended his career......let’s not forget they are allegations..but doesn’t look good.sad really if true
@jenn1fer1991 @jasebyjason https://t.co/1KCIx2TQKY
@jasebyjason I was just thinking this! Glad you mentioned it.
@jasebyjason My thought as well!
@jasebyjason 🙌🏼
@Fatima492090 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason Na he had a breakdown and noone really was there for him

@ShadowRego @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason That's terrible. I know how it feels to be singled out and ridiculed in a workplace, but never on the scale as this, so I can't imagine the pain he has gone through. I hope he's managed to find people who care for him and if not, I hope he gets the help he needs now
@ShadowRego @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason That's actually quite heartbreaking. Poor man, I hope he gets the support he needs
@jasebyjason My thoughts exactly!

@Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Another classic he said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said she said.
@pisspoorjudgem1 @Fergal_HB @jasebyjason @NoelClarke Was called out years ago shame noone listened to adam init this might of been prevented
@jasebyjason Exactly what I thought. I remember all the drama re Anuvahood, definitely some controlling characteristics at play there.

@FuckFascism4 @DanStrongTea @jasebyjason His whole career was fucked by noel he called him out for years
Got banned off instagram 
Got his jobs fucked 
Got ignored and pushed aside by people
And i believe this didnt help his mental health but people ignored @realadamdeacon until women come out about him thats fucke
@jasebyjason Adam Deacons mental health issues were taken advantage of and he was made to look psycho even though he was talking about bullying by Noel Clarke for yeeeears
@jasebyjason Sounds like Adam was right all along.
@jasebyjason No cap, I always thought the latter was in the wrong.
@jasebyjason Didn’t even think about this.  You’re so right.
